metadata.title: POST 19 03

config.question: Who helped to form the National American Woman Suffrage Association in 1890?

answer_3.response: Women espoused causes with new fervor. Susan B. Anthony, a veteran of many reform campaigns, tried to vote in the 1872 presidential election and was fined $100, which she refused to pay. In 1890, she helped form the National American Woman Suffrage Association to work for the enfranchisement of women.
